1.name: All Quiet on the Western Front
1.description: A young soldier faces profound disillusionment in the soul-destroying horror of World War I.

2.name: Hell's Angels
2.description: Brothers Monte and Ray leave Oxford to join the Royal Flying Corps. Ray loves Helen; Helen enjoys an affair with Monte; before they leave on their mission over Germany they find her in still another man's arms.

3.name: L'âge d'or
3.description: A surrealist tale of a man and a woman who are passionately in love with each other, but their attempts to consummate that passion are constantly thwarted by their families, the Church, and bourgeois society.

4.name: Der blaue Engel
4.description: An elderly professor's ordered life spins dangerously out of control when he falls for a nightclub singer.

5.name: Animal Crackers
5.description: Mayhem and zaniness ensue when a valuable painting goes missing during a party in honor of famed African explorer Captain Spaulding.

6.name: Morocco
6.description: A cabaret singer and a Legionnaire fall in love, but their relationship is complicated by the results of his womanizing and due to the appearance of a rich man who wants her for himself.

7.name: Little Rascals: Best of Our Gang
7.description: Spanky, Buckwheat, Porky and all The Little Rascals at their hilarious best!

8.name: Madam Satan
8.description: Angela and Bob Brooks are an upper class couple. Unfortunately, Bob is an unfaithful husband. But Angela has a plan to win back her husband's affections. An elaborate masquerade ball is to ...                See full summary »

9.name: The Big Trail
9.description: Breck Coleman leads hundreds of settlers in covered wagons from the Mississippi River to their destiny out West.

10.name: Murder!
10.description: A juror in a murder trial, after voting to convict, has second thoughts and begins to investigate on his own before the execution.

11.name: King of Jazz
11.description: American Pre-Code color film starring Paul Whiteman and his Jazz orchestra.

12.name: Anna Christie
12.description: A young woman reunites with her estranged father and falls in love with a sailor, but struggles to tell them about her dark past.

13.name: The Divorcee
13.description: When a woman discovers that her husband has been unfaithful to her, she decides to respond to his infidelities in kind.

14.name: Ladies of Leisure
14.description: An upper-crust artist hires a 'party girl' as a model; romance follows.

16.name: City Girl
16.description: A Chicago waitress falls in love with a Minnesota farmer, and decides to face a life in the country.

17.name: Just Imagine
17.description: New York, 1980: airplanes have replaced cars, numbers have replaced names, pills have replaced food, government-arranged marriages have replaced love, and test tube babies have replaced ......                See full summary »

18.name: Abraham Lincoln
18.description: An episodic biography of the 16th President of the United States.

19.name: Zemlya
19.description: In the peaceful countryside, Vassily opposes the rich kulaks over the coming of collective farming.

20.description: Dowdy Sylvia accepts her boss' marriage proposal, even though he only asked her to avoid marriage to another woman. As a wealthy wife, Sylvia changes from ugly duckling to uninhibited swan ...                See full summary »

21.name: Up the River
21.description: When paroled trustee Steve and former inmate Judy who try to put their criminal lives behind them are blackmailed, two career criminals come to their rescue.

22.name: Juno and the Paycock
22.description: During the Irish Civil War in 1922, a family earns a big inheritance. They start leading a rich life, forgetting what the most important values are.

23.name: Reaching for the Moon
23.description: Wall Street wizard, Larry Day, new to the ways of love, is coached by his valet. He follows Vivian Benton on an ocean liner, where cocktails, laced with a "love potion," work their magic. ...                See full summary »

24.name: The Doorway to Hell
24.description: Despite his efforts to go straight, a young gangster keeps falling back into crime.

26.name: The Big House
26.description: A convict falls in love with his new cellmate's sister, only to become embroiled in a planned break-out which is certain to have lethal consequences.

29.name: Sinners' Holiday
29.description: Ma Delano (La Verne) runs a boardwalk penny arcade, living upstairs with her sons (Cagney and Gallagher) and daughter (Knapp). Story involves rum running, accidental murder and a frame-up.

30.name: Sous les toits de Paris
30.description: Albert is smitten for Pola but ends up wrongly committed in jail, in the meantime her affections are sought after by his friend, and on his release both love and friendship must be tested.

33.name: The Dawn Patrol
33.description: World War I ace Dick Courtney derides the leadership of his superior officer, but Courtney is soon promoted to squadron commander and learns harsh lessons about sending subordinates to their deaths.

34.name: Min and Bill
34.description: Min, the owner of a dockside hotel, is forced to make difficult decisions about the future of Nancy, the young woman she took in as an infant.

35.name: The Silver Horde
35.description: A salmon fisherman has to choose between a bad girl and a society doll.

36.name: Monte Carlo
36.description: A countess flees to Monte Carlo on the day of her wedding, where she is courted by a count posing as a hairdresser.

39.description: Mary Turner goes up for three years on a crime she didn't commit. Once out she and former prison mates plan a scam in which old men can be sued for breach of promise - the "heart balm" ...                See full summary »

40.name: Born Reckless
40.description: Hoping to use the publicity to get re-elected, a judge sentences a notorious gangster to fight in the war.

44.name: The Benson Murder Case
44.description: A ruthless, crooked stockbroker is murdered at his luxurious country estate, and detective Philo Vance just happens to be there; he decides to find out who killed him.

46.name: The Unholy Three
46.description: "Talkie" remake of Tod Browning's 1925 silent film. A trio of former sideshow performers double as the "Unholy Three" in a scam to nab some shiny rocks.

48.name: Die Drei von der Tankstelle
48.description: Willy, Kurt and Hans are broke, so they sell their car and open a filling station. Then they all fall in love with the same girl.

49.name: One Romantic Night
49.description: A scheming mother wishes to make a succesful match between her daughter and a prince, yet another man, a commoner, may stand in the way.
